Open links with modded apps.description: Make the modded app open links like the original app

content.description: As you can see, when clicking the youtube link, the modded app doesn't open it, it opens on the browser
Open the settings app, navigate to the 'Apps' section and select the desired app
In the app's settings, click on the 'Open by default' option. This title may differ depending on the device and the Android version. Then toggle the 'Open supported links' option
Add all the supported links that you want the app to open. In this case, we are adding the youtube links
Now, when clicking the youtube link, the modded app will open it. This can be done with any app that doesn't open links

Disable ads auto-skip on YouTube Revance.description: Show skip button when ads are playing on YouTube Revanced

content.description: In YouTube Revanced, navigate to the settings
Select 'ReVanced' and then 'SponsorBlock'
In every segment, select 'Show a skip button'

Download media on Youtube Revanced.description: Make the YouTube Revanced app download through your preferred media downloader

content.description: Navigate to the settings of YouTube Revanced
Select 'ReVanced', then 'Player' and finally 'External downloads'
Activate the 'Show external download button' and 'Override download action button' options
Insert the package name of the media downloader that you want to use on the 'Download package name' dialog. In this case, we are using 'Seal'. The package name can be found on the app page
When playing a video, the download button will be displayed. Click on it to download the video or audio

Check VirusTotal Analysis.description: Consult the analysis of a apk file in VirusTotal

content.description: Navigate to the app that you want to check the analysis
In the providers table, in the column 'Secure', there is a button indicating the analysis status of the app in VirusTotal
Long press the button to open the analysis in the browser

Verify the SHA-256 of an APK.description: Verify the SHA-256 of an apk's VirusTotal analysis

content.description: Navigate to the app that you want to verify the SHA-256
Download the apk, by clicking on the 'install' button
Don't install the app yet, click 'cancel' on the installation dialog
Save the apk to local storage by selecting it and clicking the share button
With a tool to generate the SHA-256 of the file, like many websites or the 'Hash Droid' app, generate the SHA-256 of the apk
Compare the generated SHA-256 with the one displayed in the app. They should be the same
